result.reason: Fixes embedded PuTTY window resizing issue after waking from hibernation.
result.approach: Update PuttyBase.OnPowerModeChanged to ensure Resize is called only when the interface is ready, or schedule it to run after a brief delay to allow the UI to restore first.
